1.content:
After a long road trip, Kyle and his friends finally made it to their destination. His family had recently come into possession of a large estate, consisting of a great deal of land and the mansion that was on it. They said it was the summer home of an eccentric philanthropist, who made some bad investments and lost the property and everything in the house to the bank.

His parents planned on selling the house and everything in it, but Kyle was able to convince them to let him and his friends have the house for the week as a graduation present.

As they drove through the front gates, they were amazed by the sheer scale of everything. The driveway cut straight through a picturesque field of grass, and lead to a beautiful fountain. However, the house itself was beyond words, like something from a movie.

They parked the car around the fountain. After getting out to stretch their legs, they marveled at where they were going to spend their weekend. For free, no less.
1.title: Graduation Present

11.content:
Kyle had been driving so he was the first out of the car, “Wow, hey guys! Wake up we hit the jackpot!” he says, walking up the front steps leading to the door.

Next was James, Kyle’s best friend, “Hell yeah. When I heard you say foreclosed mansion, I thought you were taking us to a rundown dump” he said, laughing as he followed Kyle up the stairs.

“Hey come on man have a little faith,” Kyle says smiling. “Though to be honest, I’m a little surprised myself.” he then says.

Next was Nick. “Hey guys are you sure were at the right place?” he asks.

“Well, if we are, lets enjoy it for a moment before Mr. Burns releases the hounds on us” Joey says laughing as he shuts the car door.

“Well if you really doubt me there is only one way to find out” Kyle says, holding up the key to the front door. He then puts the key in the hole and tries to turn it. However, he appears to struggle with the lock. Giving up, he then quickly turns around.

“Okay, wrong house. Let's get back in the car. I think I kind of tripped the alarm…” he says, taking two steps as though to run down the stairs, causing the others to dash back to the car. However, as they turn around, the door appeared to open.

“Just kidding” Kyle says smiling.

“Ah, you should of seen the look on your faces. If I had waited another second, it looked like you all were going to leave me” he said.

“Yeah, you know I kind of like that idea” James says, looking back at Nick and Joey.

“Ah come on guys. You know you it was funny. Now come on. Let’s check this place out” Kyle says

As the four of them walk inside they were all speechless, until Nick broke the silence.

“Wow!” he says, with Kyle saying the same in agreement. The place was beyond words. It was clean and comfortable, nothing at all like an empty house. It was fully furnished and the lights worked, as if anything it felt like a fancy hotel.

“So Kyle, what is the story on this place again?” James asked.

“Well, my dad says that the previous owner was rich and this was one of his homes” he said.

“Yea we can tell, most of his stuff is still here.” Joey says.

“Well, my mom says that he made some bad investments and the house was repossessed by the bank. House, land, and everything on it.” Kyle says.

“Seriously? So this plasma screen TV, and all this furniture and anything else we find in what I’m guessing are the other room are yours too?” Joey aks as he kicks back on the living room couch.

“Yeah I guess so.” Kyle says.

“And your parents are seriously giving us free reign over this place for the next week?” James asks.

“Yeah… all ours” he says, smiling as he sits down in a living room chair.

They were all silent for a moment to let the situation sink in. Then, they all bursted out in laughing.

“No really what’s the catch? This place is haunted right?” Nick asks.

“Not that I know of” Kyle says, still laughing.

“And if so, we have a week to find out. I don’t know about you all but I’m going to go find the master bedroom” Kyle says, jumping out of his chair and running to the stairs.

“Oh hell no!” James says, jumping and chasing after him. Nick and Joey followed instantly.

"Okay everyone, pick a room! First one who finds the master bedroom gets it!” Kyle exclaims
11.title: Group 1

111.content:
They rush up the stairs. Kyle goes to the right while James to the left. Once Nick sees Joey pause at the top of the stairs, he figures there are only two hallways and decides to look around down stairs, figuring that in a place like this all the rooms were awesome.

“Come on, it has to be around here somewhere” Kyle says, opening another door. “No, linen closet” and another, “No, regular bedroom“ he says. Then, he opens another, “Ah!! Another bedroom,” he says.

“Found it!” James exclaims from the far end of the hallway.

“Ah you’ve got to be kidding me” Kyle says.

“You know you probably should of started at the end of the hall and worked your way back like I did” James says proudly"

"Well you win. Now I guess I’ve got to pick one of the other fifty rooms in this place” Kyle says, while Joey walks up to them.

“Wow I never stood a chance” he says laughing.

“Hey where is Nick?” Joey asks.

“Guess he just gave up” James said. The three of you then head back down stairs to find him. They all decide to split and search for him. As they search, they find that the house had a two-story library, a full-sized dining room, a sitting room at the back of the house which revealed a pool and hot tub in the back yard, along with a greenhouse surrounded by a garden and a kitchen with every appliance you can think of. However, there was no food in the fridge or the pantry.

And then, when they all begin to think that he had mysteriously disappeared, they all converge on the game room, where they find Nick playing a game of pool.

“Finally, we should have known.” Kyle says.

“Yeah but at least we got to check out the place right? So okay what has everyone found?” James asked.

“Well I found the kitchen, the pantry and the dining room, but no food so we need groceries for the week” Kyle says.

“Nice, so fully furnished but no food. Okay what else we got?” Nick asks.

“I found a closed-in back porch, and this place comes with a pool and a hot tub” he says.

“Sweet, now we just need girls.” Nicks says.

“Yep, I just wish we had brought some of those with us, since none of us know any around here” Joey says.

“Don’t worry, we'll take care of that later” Kyle says.

“Alright so let’s put our stuff in our rooms and go get food. We haven’t had lunch yet. James says.

“I second that motion” Nick says.
111.title: James

1111.content:
Nick lays his pool stick on the table and the four of them head out the front door and down the stairs.

“Alright we need groceries for the week and already cooked food for right now, anything else?” Kyle says, “Girls.” Nick says, “Agreed, but food first.” James says

They laugh amongst themselves as they get in the car, “So what kind of places they got to eat around here?” Joey asks, “No clue, my parents just bought the place, I’ve never been here before.” Kyle says

They drive into town, which seemed to be somewhere between a small town and a city. All the buildings were either restored or fairly new, with all that you would expect from a standard city but it didn’t seem as crowded. It looked like the perfect place for a vacation or getaway for someone who didn’t needed to get away from the city but didn’t want to be in the middle of nowhere.

They decide on a nice sports bar for dinner. Once inside they order and continue talking. “Okay guys what is the plan?” Nick says,

“Well let’s see.” James says pulling out his phone, “We already have a place to crash for the week, there is a beach about thirty minutes that way,” he says pointing to his left, “A lake about fifteen minutes that way,” he says pointing backward, “Wow this is actually a college town.” He says smiling

“Awesome, so we have plenty of options.” Joey says, The waitress then brings their drinks to the table, “Okay so I say we eat, then find a Wal-Mart to stock up on supplies and head back?” Kyle says lifting his glass

The all smile and raise their glasses in a toast. After they finished eating they easily found a Wal-Mart since it was easily within walking distance of the restaurant. They then proceeded to fill up a shopping cart with snack foods, and an assortment of other supplies for the coming week.

When they got back to the house they stocked the fridge and pantry. Then they started drinking the beer they brought from home and watching enjoying the surround sound of the home entertainment center, until each crashing in their own beds.

The next morning...
1111.title: He stops playing

11111.content:
The next morning they all wake up to the sound of howling wind and rain.

Kyle walks to his bedroom window to confirm his fears that the first day of their vacations has been called due to weather.

“Ah you have got to be kidding me!” he says walking down stair where he finds the rest of the guys in the living room sulking in disappointment.

“So what ever happened to nothing but beach weather for the next three weeks?” James asked turning to Joey which had checked the weather before they had passed out the night before

“Don’t look at me man, last night it said clear and sunny.” He said, “Well nothing we can do about it now, right? I mean it just gives us a reason to stay inside and enjoy a mansion before we have to go home to our parents places for the summer and then off to tiny little college dorms in the fall.” Kyle says

The all then pause for a moment, “Well you’ve got a point, but the more I think about it I don’t know if I should be happy or sad about it.” James says smiling, and with that they all start laughing.

Suddenly, they all hear a ringing sound.

“What the hell is that?” Nick asks, “Wow, must be the doorbell” Kyle said, “Yeah with a house this big I guess knocking wouldn’t do it.” James says

“Alright don’t everyone jump up at once,” Kyle says walking to the door

(Who is it?)
11111.title: Bad weather

111111.content:
“I mean what kind of an idiot would come out in weather like this?” Joey asks laughing as they follow behind him to the door.

Kyle then opens the door to find an angry looking college girl, “TINA! What are you doing here?” Kyle asks as she then pushes her way in, “What kind of a greeting is that for your big sister?” he says calming down once she is inside the house. “Well I’m mean, hey but what are you doing here and you came through this storm?” Kyle asks

“Well you didn’t think I would let you spend the weekend here without adult supervision did you?” she says smiling, “What do you mean mom and dad gave me the key.” He says, “Yeah but I warned them how teenagers can be all alone… and this close to the beach.” She says smiling, “You did what!” he exclaims, “But don’t worry now that I’m here everything will be fine.” She says proudly

“Give me a break, you’re only two years older than us, you just want to use this place yourself!” he exclaims, Kyle then looks over at his friends since they hadn’t said anything since she got here, and you could see why. Tina was soaking wet and defiantly wasn’t wearing a rain coat, her clothes were all wet and basically see through.

Upon noticing that his sister’s clothes were see-through he quickly rushes to the nearest linen closet and grabs a towel, “Ah GUYS!” you say covering her up, which breaks their concentration. They then look at each other and all smile, “Calm down man, I mean if you ask me things just got more interesting.” James says

Nick and James then pull Kyle over to the side while Joey shows Tina to the living room. “I can’t believe this, she always does this!” he says, “Calm down man take a deep breath. Now think about this, last night we said we need girls, right?” James says,

“Yeah,” Kyle nods his head in agreement

“And what is one thing you hot college girl sister has?” Nick says, “Hot college girl friends.” Kyle says with a small smile.

“Exactly, and since we are now soon to be college guys I think we take this time to familiarize ourselves with the ritual of a college party.” James says smiling

“Well it’s not a bad idea, but do you think she would do that for us?” Kyle asks

“Well we know why she is here and it’s not like she would ask us to leave, so I’m thinking if we play our cards right we could make this happen.” James says

“Well only one way to find out.” Kyle says

The three of them then return to the living room with big smiles on their faces.
111111.title: Kyle's Sister

choices: Kyle and James walk down stairs
1111111.content:
“Hey sis, I’m so sorry about the rude welcome. I mean my home is your home right?” Kyle says, she then smiles, “Let me guess, you want me to work my magic and throw a party that will make all of you legends before college even starts?” she ask

“Yeah that would be great.” Nick says, with a big smile picturing the mansion filled with hot college girls like Tina. “As my drooling friend here so subtly put it, Yes.” Kyle says laughing

“Okay, but I have a few conditions.” Tina says standing up, “Okay such as?” Kyle asks

“First off, the master bedroom is mine.” She says

“Done.” Kyle says, “Hey!” James says, “You didn’t think she would do this for free would you?” Kyle says

“Next, you guys pay for everything.” She says, “Okay but only the stuff that’s party related” Kyle says, “Damn, but alright fair enough.” She says, “And you have to buy us alcohol.” James says, “Okay, as long as it’s your money.” She says

“Alright so we have a deal, so we all stay here for the week. Besides the party which you plan and we pay for, we do our thing and you do your, right?” Kyle says, “Sounds about right, Deal.” She says as the two shake hands.

And with that all the guys smile, “But there is no way I can throw one together with that hurricane outside, so for the time being it looks like we’re staying in.” she says walking upstairs, “And by the way, ya’ll wouldn’t mind getting my bags would you? Thanks.” She says making her way up the stairs

They then vote Kyle and James to go get Tina’s stuff out of her car. And after braving the hurricane they manage to make it back inside her five very heavy bags. “Is she staying for the week or moving in?” James asks as they drag the bags up the stairs, “Oh this is nothing, you should of seen how much she packed when we went on vacation last year.” He says laughing

They drop the bags in the master bedroom where Tina has already made herself at home.

“This place is amazing! A party here really would make us famous.” She says smiling, “And thanks again for getting my bags.” She says smiling, which makes James smile back like an idiot

“No problem and just make sure you make it one for the record books.” Kyle says smiling
1111111.title: She is Happy to Help

11111111.content:
Kyle and James then make their way downstairs and crash on the couch.

“Well that was fun.” Joey says, Kyle and James just look at Joey like he was an idiot. “Well at least it’s settled and instead of us finding girls, they’ll just come to us.” Nick says

“Yeah good point, but until then lets kick back and enjoy this beautiful plasma screen.” Kyle says as he put his feet up on the coffee table.

Suddenly…
11111111.title: Kyle and James walk down stairs

111111111.content:
Suddenly everything goes black.

“Oh come on!” Nick says, “Well I guess with the weather it’s not surprising.” Kyle says

They then hear a woman screaming, “Don’t worry Joey, everything’s okay.” James says turning to Joey jokingly, but Joey simply disregards it while the others laugh, “Calm down Tina, Just stay there, were on our way!” Kyle calls to her

“Alright ill go get her, ya’ll find some flash lights or something.” Kyle says turning on his cell phone for light.

He then walks up the stair to the master bedroom to find Tina laying on the bed, “Hey you okay?” he asks, “Yeah I am now.” She says, he then leads her down stair, “So why didn’t you just use your phone.” Kyle says laughing

Tina remains silent which makes Kyle laugh out loud, “Hey! It’s not funny you know I don’t like the dark!” she says clenching his arm. “But if you would of taken out your phone it wouldn’t of been as dark.” He says laughing, “Stop that! I panicked” she says kind of embarrassed

When they reach the living room the guys already had it lit up with lanterns. Tina was instantly relieved and back to her confident somewhat pushy self. “Great work guys,” Tina says, “Yeah it looks like the lanterns on the walls aren’t just for decoration.” Joey says “Yeah but not all of them seem to be working, but all the ones in the living room are.” James says

“Alright so what are we suppose to do now?” Kyle says

“Well we’ve got the game room, but the lights aren’t working in there?” Nick says

“Okay well I’m pretty sure I saw some board games or maybe a deck of cards.” Joey says

“Okay me and Joey will go get something, ya’ll stay here.” Kyle says

Kyle and Joey then take out their cell phones and make their way to the game room.

“Okay let’s see, ill search this side you take that side.” Joey says, they then search the room and find an assortment of board games.

“Hey I found the board games.” Joey says, “Anything on your end?” he asks, “Well I found a poker set but I dint see any cards.” Kyle says

“Okay board game it is.” Then they sort through the collection to find that the majority of them were ones they had never heard of. “What big house, and a game room but no checkers, no monopoly?” Kyle says, “Hey how about this one?” Joey says holding up a game in an unusual box with a picture of the world on it.

“What is this?” he asks curiously turning over the box, “World of Change, Travel across space and time to experience the world through unfamiliar eyes.” Kyle says, “Na, I don’t think the guys would be interested.” Kyle says, “Wait,” Joey says pointing to a note on the bottom of the box, “Warning: Due to mature content not recommended for younger players.” Joey says, “Okay yeah now they would be interested.” Kyle says laughing

They bring the game back to the living room and set it on the coffee table.

“What’s that?” Tina asks, “It’s called World of change, for mature players only.” Joe says smiling, “Nice an R rated board game, due to language and nudity.” Nick says jokingly, “Well anything is possible, I’m pretty sure Wal-Mart doesn’t carry it.” Kyle says

They then open the box...
111111111.title: The power goes out

choices: The game picks who goes first
They roll to see who goes first
1111111111.content:
They open the box and Tina grabs the instructions. “Let’s see, each player chooses a piece, rolls a dice, where you land means different things blah, blah, blah. And the first one to the end wins.” Tina says, “Well looks like you found a cheap knockoff of monopoly with no money.” She says

“Well it was the most interesting looking one in the collection so let’s just try it and if we don’t like it well go get another one.” Joey says, “Okay fair enough, and hopefully the power won’t be out for too much longer.” James says

They set up the board, noticing the starting line, the path that you follow, and four types of cards set up in stacks, at each of the four corners of the game, and a glass screen in the middle of the board that the path seemed to lead to.

“Okay everyone pick a game piece.” Kyle says, they all then choose one of the available pieces.

Nick quickly snatched up the Statue of Liberty. He wanted one of the American landmarks.

Kyle grabbed a piece that looked like the Eiffel Tower, but it was painted red and white.

"That's the Tokyo Tower, you idiot." Tina chimed in noting her brother's confused look. He sneered back at her as she picked up the Sphinx.

Joey looked over the remaining pieces and chose Big Ben.

James thought about it for a second, and ultimately said, "I'll opt this time. I'll just watch you guys play for now." He took a seat in an arm chair across the room.

"Spoil sport!" Tina mocked!

"Leave him alone! Let's just start!"
1111111111.title: The pieces are famous land marks

11111111111.content:
After the group placed their pieces on the board, a mysterious voice boomed from seemingly nowhere, "Kyle has been selected to go first."

The jaws of everyone dropped. There was no indication that anything in this small box could make that kind of noise, and even if it could, there was no way it would be able to call one of the group members out by name. They were all a little bit freaked out, but Kyle reluctantly rolled anyway.

Five.

He landed on a red space and picked up a card, per the game's instructions.

"What does it say?" Tina asked him.

"I...don't...know." Kyle responded.

Tina grabbed the card from him, and on the flip side was nothing but a bunch of Japanese characters. "Well, this sucks!" She exclaimed, "How are we supposed to play a game that we can't even read? This is so stupid. Is there anything else we can play?"

As Tina rambled on, Joey, Nick, and James were looking at Kyle with their jaws dropped. His body glowed for for a brief moment, and suddenly where he once was a fashionable Japanese woman. Kyle seemed horrified that he was now female. He was a little bit curious too, but he wasn't about to check out his new body in front of his friends. He grabbed the card from Tina's hand, and realized that he could now read it!

It said:
"The changes for you
Will broaden your horizons
But leave you left out"

He didn't really know what that card even meant as he let loose a barrage of profanity.

Nick interrupted him, "Dude, we can't hear a word your saying!"

Kyle looked puzzled. Nick's words were gibberish to him. He tried to communicate, but he quickly realized that he was now speaking Japanese. And he also realized that he could no longer speak English! He started pointing to the next player to try to indicate that they should continue to game, so he could hopefully get out of this mess!
11111111111.title: The game picks who goes first

choices: Nick tries to skip to the end
111111111111.content:
For a moment everyone stands there speechless, at the site of Kyle panicking in a language they couldn’t understand.

“Wait! I’ve got it!” James says pulling out his Smartphone and handing it to Kyle. Kyle then takes the phone and looks at the screen, James had brought up a translation app. He then mutters something into it and shows the screen to you, “What the fuck just happened, I can’t understand English anymore?” Tina reads, “Yeah but you know we probably could have figured that one out without the translator.” Nick says laughing, Kyle then slaps nick upside the head.

“So wait does this mean we should call him Kylie or Kaylie now?” Tina says laughing, followed by everyone else, except Kyle who seemed confused and annoyed since he could obviously tell he was laughing at him. “Oh yeah that’s right since he can’t understand us he didn’t get the joke.” James says laughing

Kyle then speaks into the phone again and turns on the audio option, “This isn’t funny” he phone says

Tina then takes the phone and says, “Well actually it kind of is, and you look adorable by the way.” The guys then burst out laughing as the phone translates it to Japanese. As Kyle listens to it his face instantly turns red with embarrassment as everyone smiles and laughs.

Suddenly, a familiar voice says, “Nick has been selected to go next.”

And with that everyone got quiet and turns to Nick, even Kyle, it seems that he could understand it too.

“Wait what are you looking at me for?” Nick says, “You hear it, it is your turn.” James says smiling, “No way, you see Tokyo drift girl over here.” He says pointing to Kyle, which didn’t need a translation to know what he was talking about. “Yeah but if you stop playing then he could be stuck like this.” James says, “Well that’s easy for you to say, you’re not playing so you’ve just got a front row seat for free.” Joey says, “Okay you’ve got a point, but seriously board games don’t have off switches and I’m willing to bet with stacks like this yall can’t just quit.” James says
111111111111.title: Nick goes next

1111111111111.content:
“Ahh! James why did you have to be the voice of reason?!” Nick says, “Easy, cause my buddies in trouble and he would do the same thing for any of us.” James says, they then sink their heads at the thought of how selfish they were about to be. “Well that and like you said I’m sitting out this game so either Kyle stays a hot Asian chick or yall continue and join in the fun, either way I win.” He says as he kicks back on the couch

They then all act as though they were surprised by his true reasoning for suggesting they continue. “Yeah that sounds more like James logic.” Joey says, “But let’s just remember the first thing he said and finish this quick, if it’s just transformations then we should be able to grin and bear it till it’s over.” Joey says

Nick then picks up the dice, takes a deep breath, and carefully rolls them onto the board.

Seven

He lands on a blue space. He quickly closes his eyes in fear of a transformation but slowly opens then to see that nothing had changed, which makes Kyle sulk in disappointment that Nick didn’t receive a similar fate as he did.

Suddenly the center of the screen began to glow and a bright flash fills the room. Moments later when everyone comes to they instantly notice a pure warm light coming through the windows, and white sand covering the floor.

The silence was then broken by a female scream.

Everyone then instantly looks to Kyle, he was freaking out because now not only was he a hot Asian girl but now he was wearing a string bikini with a see through mini skirt wrap. They then look to Tina to see that she was now wearing a thong bikini. Kyle was embarrassed and tried to cover up as much as possible, which the guys found very entertaining until Tina brought their attention to their clothes. James was still wearing his normal clothes but Joey was wearing swim trunks and a tropical button up shirts with a straw hat and Nick who had remained quiet so far was now wearing nothing but a loose fitting shirt. But everyone could instantly tell by the look on his face that there was more to it than that.

“Ah Nick please tell me your not wearing a Speedo under there?”Joey asks, “Ah yeah…” Nick says, suddenly they all burst out laughing. Accept Kyle who didn’t find much funny considering his situation just got more embarrassing.

Tina then gets up and walks to the front door, quickly getting the guys attention as she swayed her hips as she walked. She then opens the door and silently walks into a warm light, “Guys you have got to come see this!” she says, they instantly follow her.

As they cross the threshold it takes a moment for their eyes to adjust but even before they could see they could feel the sun’s rays and the fresh sea air on their skin. And one they could see the where instantly speechless, they were now on a beautiful beach.

“How the hell did this happen?!” Nick says, “I don’t know,” Tina says as she walks into the water, “But the water feels amazing.” She says smiling. Nick and Joey instantly run in to see for themselves. “Wait so did the game sent us to the beach, Mansion and all?” James asks “I don’t think so!” Joey calls from the water, “I don’t think the mansion has moved, see?” he says pointing out toward the horizon. “They then look to see that the great fence and hedges that went around the perimeter of the property were still clearly visible.

“So wait, does that mean that the game only changed everything around the mansion to the property line?” James asks, “Looks like it.” Tina says walking back onto the beach and laying down in the perfect temperature sand.

“So okay, so red means draw a card and transform, and blue changes the property and our clothes.” Tina says, “Yeah accept for me since I’m not playing.” James says, “So I wonder if people can see us from the outside?” Nick says walking back onto the beach. “Well if they can I’m sure there will be a news crew here soon.” James says pointing to the closed front gate, “See you can see through the gate and it’s still dark and stormy on the other side. But on this side its nothing but clear skies and sunshine.” He says taking off his shoes to feel the sand between his toes.
1111111111111.title: Nick takes his turn

11111111111111.content:
For a moment everyone enjoys the weather, except Kyle, that continues to try and hide his new body from the eyes of his leering idiot friends, but unfortunately it just makes things more amusing. They openly laugh at his failed attempt.

“Man I wouldn’t believe it if I hadn’t seen him change with my own eyes,” Joey says, “Which reminds me, it’s getting a little frustrating thinking of hot Asian chick as Kyle so all in favor of referring to “her” as Kaylie say aye?”

“Aye!” everyone seems to says at once as Kyle simply looks at them confused and worried since he could understand the names Kyle and Kaylie were just used in the same sentence.

He then jumps up and walk towards the group without even worrying about his hip swaying or his breasts bouncing. Joey then grabs the phone and says, “We just decided that you shall be referred to as Kaylie.” The phone then translates it and Kyle’s face instantly turns red both from embarrassment and anger as he yells in Japanese while the others all laughed.

But the argument was soon interrupted by the game voice saying. “Joey has been selected to go next.”

And with that Kyle simply looks at Joey smiling as to say, “Alright smart ass you’re up.”

And Joey being the proud dumbass he is, walks over to the board, picks up the dice, and rolls then without flinching or looking.

Ten

He lands on a red space, but pauses for a moment as though he just realized that karma was fixing to bite him. He then stands up straight and slowly picks up a card trying not to let on that he was nervous.

“Ah a red card,” Tina says walking closer to try and see, “What does this one say?” she asks

“Imitation is the highest form of flattery…?” Joey says looking up to see everyone staring at him wide eyed and on the verge of laughter. He then looked down to see a familiar glow. As it fades he quickly notices that he is now a woman.

“Ofcourse! Just my luck!” he says, but everyone was still speechless, “Yeah I get it, I was messing with Kyle and now I’m a girl too just go ahead and laugh.” He says,

“Ah that’s not what they are speechless about.” Tina says backing away, “What is it?” Joey asks

And with a big mocking smile, Kyle walks up to Joey and holds up the phone in front of him so that he could see his reflection. And with that Joey froze, he was so caught up in being turned into a girl that he hadn’t taken the time to actually consider the meaning of the card. He wasn’t just a girl; he was nearly an exact copy of Tina!

He quickly grasps the phone to get a closer look, biologically he was defiantly Tina; he had her face, and her voice, and her figure down to the last curve. But there were a few differences; Tina’s hair was long and curly but his was now shoulder length and straight, his clothes were also slightly different but unfortunately for him not that different, he was now wearing a thong bikini just in a different style.

Once everyone saw the look in his eyes that signaled that he now understood what they were staring at they all burst out laughing, as Joeys face turns bright red.

Kyle then speaks into the phone and holds it up to Joey, the phone then translated Kyle’s words into, “Welcome to the club, SIS” he then laughs while Joey stands there frustrated and speechless.
11111111111111.title: Joey's Turn

111111111111111.content:
After that comment it almost looked like Joey was fixing to Jump on Kyle, and with Nick and James on edge hoping for a cat fight the situation was getting pretty tense. Until Tina stepped in to break it up.

“Ladies please, you don’t want to give those two fools what they want do you.” She says,

They then look to see the stupid anxious looks on their faces, and with that they turn around and walk opposite ways while shooting the “still” guys dirty looks.

“Alright and I guess that means I’m next.” Tina says walking up to the board, which then says, “Tina has been chosen to go next,” Almost as though it was agreeing with her.

She then casually rolls the dice figuring that since she is already a girl she has nothing to worry about.

Four

She lands on a green spot and picks up a green card.

“Nice, we haven’t landed on one of these yet,” she says knowing that it means they get to stay on the beach and she isn’t going to transform. “Let’s see: Challenge the player of your choice to a one on one competition. Winner can change one thing about the loser.” She says

And with that Kyle jumps up and down, “What’s that girl, Timmy’s trapped in the old well?” James says laughing. Kyle then reaches for the phone and begins to speak, “Hey that’s it, if you challenge Ky… I mean Kaylie and she loses you can fix her voice.” Nick says laughing

Kyle then nodes up and down, though still a little annoyed since Nick said Kaylie.

“That’s a great idea, I mean this is hilarious but I think it would be more entertaining if she could understand what were saying about her.” James says

“Okay that works, so I challenge Kyle to… Let’s see something quick and easy since you’re not going to really be trying.” She says, “Okay how about limbo?” Nick says

“Perfect, Okay I challenge Kyle to a limbo competition.”

Suddenly a limbo pole appears between the two of them. Tina then gestures for Kyle to go first; He instantly does and intentionally loses. The pole then disappears.

“Okay and as the winner I’ll change…
111111111111111.title: Tina's Turn

1111111111111111.content:
“Okay as the winner I hereby change Kyle’s language to English.” Tina says

All eyes then turn to Kyle, he takes a deep breath and says, “Did it work?” he then quickly covers his mouth and everyone starts to laugh.

Apparently he could speak and understand English now but he still has the cutest Japanese accent.

“Aww that’s adorable.” Joey says laughing, “Hey it’s not funny, and by the way, nice thong.” He replies smiling,“Though if you ask me, I think the game gave you one that’s a size to small, that or it made your butt bigger than Tina’s.” Joey stops laughing as he reaches back to try and hide his butt.

Everyone besides Joey then starts laughing as well, “Okay who’s idea was it to let him speak English again?” Joey says

“Calm down Joey, I think its fair considering the stuff you were saying when he couldn't understand you.” James says,

“Wait what?” Kyle says still getting use to his new accent. “Don’t worry about Kaylie.” Tina says smiling

Kyle then shrugs the comment off with a smirk, “Okay now let’s get back to the game so yall can all get back to normal.” James says.

“Yeah that’s easy for you to say, you’re probably happy that were only on the first quarter of the board.” Nick says.

“Yeah pretty much, I mean you can’t buy entertainment like this.” He says laughing, “And mathematically speaking it looks like in total there are 40 spaces total on this board, so even if you all roll double sixes you still have at least three to four more rolls each, but I wonder if you get to roll again for doubles?” he says

“That’s a good question. But I’m sure if someone does the game will let us know.” Joey says trying to pull the thong out of his butt.

“Yep so come on, things are just getting good?” James says sitting down on the beach
1111111111111111.title: Fix Kyle's Language

choices: Change all spaces into transformation spaces
11111111111111111.content:
"Let's keep going and get this over with." Kyle said.

As if in response, the voice said "All players have gone; it is now Kaylie's turn."

For a moment everyone pauses looking at each other to make sure they had all heard the same thing, they then burst out laughing all at once.

“Wait what?! Please tell me it didn’t just call me Kaylie!” Kyle says, “Well you don’t really look like a Kyle anymore.” James says, “Yeah I guess the game heard our suggestion.” Nick says laughing

Kyle took the dice and rolled again.

Five

The piece landed on a yellow space. Kyle read the card; "You may alter any game rule for two turns. Well that doesn't help me any." he says

"Well what do you want to change?" Tina asked.
11111111111111111.title: Kyle's Turn

111111111111111111.content:
"I change all spaces into transformation spaces." Kyle says

Suddenly all the spaces turned red.

"Have fun Nick." He says smiling

“It is now nick's turn” the game says

Nick rolled the dice with a shaking hand.

Two

He picked up the red card.

"All your luck has run out." Nick says, "What is that suppose to mean?"

Nick found out a moment later as saw that he was now a woman, mid thirties, had blonde hair to her shoulders and wearing a black dress.

"I've seen that outfit at casinos before," Tina said. "Guess your luck ran out." Everyone got a good laugh from that.

James could not conceal his joy. "I'm now the only guy here. This is going to be one hell of a weekend."
111111111111111111.title: Nick's turn

1111111112.content:
As they open the box a strange light seems to be coming from inside, glowing brighter and brighter as the top is removed from the base until suddenly strange balls of light begin escaping from the box and scattering in every direction.

Everyone jumps back, not quite sure what had just happened.

“What the hell was that?!” Tina exclaimed, “How should I know.” Nick says getting up off the floor.

“Hey what’s that?” James says noticing a faint light still coming from the box, “Okay everyone stand back.” Kyle says looking to see what it is.

He then reaches in to find a piece of paper and five balls of light. He then picks up the paper and with that the five balls of light flew in front of each of them all turning a different color. Kyle then begins to looks at the strange paper which was no longer glowing.

“What does it say?” James asks, “

“Well let’s see; World of change, time and space, unfamiliar eyes. Oh here we go, balls of light, okay it looks like by opening the box we started the game. I think it’s like a Easter egg hunt where we have to find the balls of light that got out of the box.” He says

“Okay but if it’s just a race to see who can find the most why does it go ahead and give us one each?” Tina asks,

“Well…” Kyle says skimming the paper, “Oh wow, well it looks like there is more to it than just finding them, it says here that each color is for a different kind of transformation…” he says,

“Transformations?” Tina asks, “Yeah it says blue changes age, green changes into an objects, yellow changes ethnicity, white changes location, pink changes gender, orange changes clothes and red modifies details of current form.” Kyle says
Everyone then looks to see what color they and each other have. Nick has orange, James has pink, Tina has Blue, Joey has white, and Kyle has red. But upon closer inspection all but the white ball had a gold ring around it.

"Hey why doesn't mine have a gold ring around it?" Joey asks, "Oh yeah, it says that normal orbs only work on one person but those with gold rings affect multiple people. White is for location so it effects everyone anyway." He says

"No fair, why do i get the lame one?" Joey ask, "Wait you don't actually believe all this do you?" James asks, "Well the magical balls of light hovering in front of us are pretty convensing." Tina says
1111111112.title: Something Strange Happens

choices: Josh revealed that he had invited some girls from school
Brandon suggests playing a pen and paper RPG
All of the suitcases disappear along with what they are wearing
They find strange chairs with wires coming out of them
There is a gift wrapped package on the floor
12.content:
Kyle had been looking forward to this trip ever since his parents had told him about buying the mansion. Him and his friends had just finished their junior year of high school and couldn't wait for vacation. Accompanying Kyle were three of his close friends that he had know since kindergarten.

Josh was a tall and well built rugby player that was a bit of a party animal. He had taken to drinking in his freshman year and was known as a trouble maker to Kyle's parents. He wore his team jacket that he was never seen without and had his light blond hair buzzed short. Along with his suitcases Josh had brought several cases of beer that his older brother had bought for him.

Mike was the social climber of the group. With a small but athletic frame Mike had the boy next door looks and outgoing personality that earned him a steady stream of topnotch girls. He wasn't the party machine that Josh was but would never turn down a fun time. He had wavy brown hair that was never out of place.

Brandon was the most academically oriented of the group. He had always been very bright and was sure to make it into an ivy league school one day. Brandon was a shorter black kid who had been dating his girlfriend Nikki since middle school.

Kyle's dad had told him that the house was huge but they were all impressed by the grandeur of it. Long crescent steps brought them past marble columns to the front door. Upon opening the door...
12.title: Game 2

122.content:
The four of them hadn't played since Middle school and their social lives had started to drift them apart. They remained friends but it became unfeasible to maintain. Brandon was the only one still carrying that torch enough to bring it up... this time though seemed like the right time. As amazing as this mansion was it was far out of the way of any activities to do. and really this might be the last chance for them to really get together and play before college came and split them up for good. Maybe it was nostalgia talking but everyone eventually came around to the idea Josh being the slowest to accept but eventually relenting.

When pressed Brando revealed a room the others hadn't seen when they were exploring the first time around. Some kind of game room, it had dramatic lighting and a large oval table it even had sets of ornate dice. it seemed the previous owner had been a table top gamer as well. But the pièce de résistance was an old boxed module Brandon had never heard of... despite it's apparent age it looked in remarkable condition with some gorgeous art... it was decided that tonight they would play -
122.title: Brandon suggests playing a pen and paper RPG

125.content: How big was the present?
125.title: A present? For us?

choices: they find it cover in dust
they find a deck of magic poker card that swap stuff

13.title: Game 3

choices: This was gonna be insanely good (the castle is majestic).
This will be good (the castle is well-sized and pleasant).
This may be good (the castle is okay, but not that big).
This might not be that impressive (the castle is wooden or ruined).
14.content:
Kyle and his friends were at a castle. Supposedly, it was a gift from some distant relation that had been part of the nobility of some old kingdom that few people remembered.

Upon looking at the castle, it was clear...
14.title: What a castle!

info.brief_description: Kyle and his friends play a game that takes role playing to a whole new level.
info.description:
In this story a group of friends on spring break end up staying at a recently foreclosed mansion and stumbling upon a magical game that transforms them in one way or another. It can be any game but I figured an easy way to set it up would for them to find the box, container, or rules to said game which starts everything.

Right now I’m not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
